mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company (com_id, com_pw, com_name, com_size, com_ceo, com_addr, com_companynum, com_tel, com_email, com_url, make_date) VALUES (#{com_id}, #{com_pw}, #{com_name}, #{com_size}, #{com_ceo}, #{com_addr}, #{com_companynum}, #{com_tel}, #{com_email}, #{com_url}, #{make_date})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM company WHERE com_id = #{com_id}
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM company WHERE com_id = #{com_id}
SELECT * FROM company WHERE com_id = #{com_id} AND com_pw = #{com_pw}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM com_interest WHERE mem_no = #{mem_no} AND com_no = #{com_no}
